name: Control
description: Teams fight to hold a single objective; the first team to win two rounds wins the map.

name: Assault
description: Attackers fight to capture a series of objectives; defenders hold them off until time runs out.

name: Escort
description: Attackers escort a payload to a delivery point, while defenders strive to stop them.

name: Capture the Flag
description: Teams compete to capture the enemy teamâ€™s flag while defending their own.

name: Hybrid
description: Attackers capture a payload, then escort it to its destination; defenders try to hold them back.

name: Elimination
description: Eliminate all enemies to win the round; win three rounds to win the map. Available with teams of one, three, or six.

name: Deathmatch
description: Players race to score the most kills in a free-for-all format.

name: Team Deathmatch
description: Players race to score the most kills in a team-based format.
